id.description:
Adds a unique identifier to the heading.
Useful when the heading needs to be referenced by another element.
Not intended for styling.
id.name: id

element.description: Allows overriding of the element rendered. Defaults to the heading specified with level.
element.name: element

maxLines.description:
The maximum amount of lines the text can occupy before being truncated with "...".
Uses predefined string values that correspond to a doubling scale for the amount of lines.
maxLines.name: maxLines

UNSAFE_className.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom classNames for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_className.name: UNSAFE_className

UNSAFE_style.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom styles for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_style.name: UNSAFE_style
